original_text: Uzzi was the leader of the Levites in Jerusalem. He was the son of Bani and grandson of Hashabiah. His other ancestors were Mattaniah and Mica. Uzzi was one of Asaph's descendants. Asaph's family were the singers who had authority for the music in the temple. Uzzi was the leader of the Levites in Jerusalem. He was the son of Bani and grandson of Hashabiah. His other ancestors were Mattaniah and Mica. Uzzi was one of Asaph's descendants. Asaph's family were the singers who had authority for the music in the temple.
korean_text: 노래하는 자들인 아삽 자손 중 미가의 현손 맛다냐의 증손 하사뱌의 손자 바니의 아들 웃시는 예루살렘에 거주하는 레위 사람의 감독이 되어 하나님의 전 일을 맡아 다스렸으니

sentences.original_text: Uzzi was the leader of the Levites in Jerusalem.
He was the son of Bani
His other ancestors were Mattaniah and Mica.
Uzzi was one of Asaph's descendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 우시는 아삽의 후손 중 한 명이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: who had authority for the music in the temple.
